hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Breakout on Regulatory Clarity Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC consolidates within ±5% of its 20-day VWAP for 7+ days during NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above +5% threshold coinciding with positive regulatory news sentiment (>0.3 score) triggers a regime shift to BULL with 85% probability within 3 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended consolidation during neutral periods represents accumulation; regulatory clarity (MiCA/FCA developments) reduces systemic risk premium, triggering institutional flows. The +5% breakout level filters false moves while capturing early regime transitions.
entry_conditions: BTC price within ±5% of 20-day VWAP for ≥7 consecutive days

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC price reaches +12% above entry VWAP level
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC price drops back below +2% VWAP threshold

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout above +5% VWAP fails to sustain >3 days OR subsequent regime classifier output remains NEUTRAL despite price action.
